sprint_goal: Establish the core system foundation, including all master data models (Customer, Driver, Vehicle) and the complete Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) framework.
Implement the complete end-to-end trip lifecycle and build the Driver Portal MVP, enabling trip creation, assignment, and execution from start to delivery.

Focus on high-complexity features: deliver the core financial workflow with GST E-Invoicing, implement the live GPS map view, build the manager's dashboard, and complete the data migration scripts. This sprint is oversized and should be split.
